en-US.StandardScriptNeedToRunAsAdmin: Script needs to be run with elevated priviligues and has been opened in a new console window. This window will be closed automatically.
en-US.StandardScriptTerminatedByCtrlC: Script has been naually aborted by Ctrl-C.
